name: Project Pandorum
description:
Here is a new idea of game, a test project where you are evaluated by robots to check your logical process and survival decitions.

Have to learn how to avoid and pass the sensors in all the facility, using some lements that you can install on your suit.

Most to consider how to use then cause you can die if get out of energy or oxygen.

Here comes another decition to survive, to test yourself with the implements you found or take the energy and oxygen of another human that is on a cryosphere.

This game was created to the GOEDWAREGAMEJAM with those themes

LOVE DEATH + ROBOTS

THE PRICE OF FREEDOM

Hope you enjoy it and like it
